to am so sorry this happened to you first and foremost you re not bad mom the first couple of weeks after birth are really tough even when you ve had an uneventful labor cried and had terrible anxiety for weeks straight after my son was born and he arrived with zero complications you should make an appointment to see your ob gyn and tell them how you re feeling and have them check your surgery site and for uti bladder infection just in case if you re in the also look into legal counsel usually do recommend suing people but this was exceptionally bad and dangerous care and at the very least think
